select sum(a.pay_amount) payAmount,a.pay_type payType from pay_info a
left join cost_detail b on a.bill_number = b.bill_child_number left join cost_info c on b.cost_info_id = c.id left join rental_info d on c.rental_id = d.id left join room e on e.id = d.room_id
where
month(a.pay_time) = month(NOW())
year(a.pay_time) = year(NOW())
and e.user_id = #{logonUserId}
group by a.pay_type
